title: Account Hacking
body:
Hello Riot,

I believe i found a way to crack summoner's account passwords. I was wondering if it's ok if i try to do a proof of concept on one of my personal accounts and then submit the code to RIOT to fix the issue.

Please advise.

replies.body: I'm not aware of any means to crack a player's account.  If you're referring to the code provided during account recovery, that's why it's so i[mportant to keep emails and anything outside of league secure j](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)ust as much as an account.  If you feel like sharing in any case, feel free to reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as the boards wouldn't be the place place for it.  Thanks!
